item.title: How do I fix a pk server?
item.dc:creator: @indiankid indiankid
item.description:
@indiankid wrote:

you can change it but it will take up all your time and stuff and then if u make pimpscape non pk you would have to add everything ur self like smithing and fishing cooking… umm only thing u can do in pimpscape is just fight… and basically it would be the worst if you ask me… i am not being mean or judging you or anything but just saying it would be too easy to train… well anyways you should fallow the tut “maken safe spots” and add it to ever where u want it to nonpk… thats alot of work but hey if u want go right a head… and if u want i will post the link to the tut for u[br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2007, 10:08:04[/size][hr]and here is the link to the tut how to create safe zones…:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

and have fun!

Indian
